name: Time Survivor DEMO
description:
TAIMU SUBAIBA
(Time Survivor)
DEMO VERSION

You are Petra, starting your first character in the popular MMORPG, Time Survivor.  The starting point of the game seems to be altered from it's original state, and the creator of the game has requested your help with figuring this all out!

Meet some fellow players, finish a few quests given by Moderators, find secret bosses and locations!

(THIS PROJECT IS A WORK IN PROGRESS)
Proudly created using NESmaker!

NOTES/BUGS:
* Sometimes Petra gets stopped by an invisible wall when moving from one screen to another. Hitting the A button while continuing forward seems to do the trick, or just approaching from a further distance.
* If an NPC doesn't have the correct dialogue assigned, it may repeat text from other parts of the game
* There may still be ways out of the main game, which leads to a strange glitch zone. I tried to remove all of the bad warps, but I might have missed one or two.
* Occasional, minor graphics errors
